name: AirMax 270
shortDescription: Lightweight running shoe with air cushioning
longDescription: The Nike AirMax 270 features our largest Max Air unit yet for unbelievable comfort all day. Breathable mesh upper combines with a foam midsole for lightweight cushioning.

name: Grid 9000
longDescription: Reebok's iconic 90s running shoe returns with updated cushioning technology. Features a Hexalite comfort system and durable rubber outsole for superior traction.

name: Suede Classic
shortDescription: Iconic suede sneaker with timeless style
longDescription: Puma's most recognizable silhouette features a premium suede upper, cushioned footbed, and signature Formstrip design. Perfect for casual everyday wear.

name: Campus Retro
longDescription: The Campus Retro combines vintage styling with modern comfort technology. Features a padded collar, vulcanized rubber sole, and breathable canvas upper.

name: UltraBoost 22
longDescription: Adidas UltraBoost 22 features responsive Boost midsole, Primeknit+ adaptive fit, and Continental™ Rubber outsole for premium grip in all conditions.

name: Marathon Runner
shortDescription: Durable sports shoes for daily use
longDescription: Asian Marathon Runner features air-cooled insoles, high-traction rubber sole, and reinforced toe cap for long-lasting durability during intense workouts.

name: Air Zoom Pegasus
longDescription: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 features Zoom Air units in forefoot for responsive cushioning, engineered mesh upper for breathability, and wider toe box for natural movement.

name: Nano X1
longDescription: Reebok Nano X1 training shoes feature Floatride Energy Foam cushioning, Flexweave® knit upper, and durable rubber outsole for multidirectional movement support.

name: RS-X³
longDescription: Puma RS-X³ Puzzle combines chunky retro styling with modern comfort. Features RS (Running System) cushioning and mixed-material upper for unique texture combinations.

name: Skate Pro
longDescription: Campus Skate Pro features vulcanized rubber sole for board feel, reinforced toe cap, and impact-absorbing insole for skateboarding performance.

name: NMD_R1
longDescription: Adidas NMD_R1 combines retro running shoe DNA with modern technologies. Features Boost midsole, Primeknit upper, and signature EVA plug inserts.

name: Trekker Pro
longDescription: Asian Trekker Pro features waterproof membrane, aggressive lug pattern outsole, and ankle support for hiking and outdoor activities.

name: Metcon 7
longDescription: Nike Metcon 7 features dual-density foam for stability during lifts, flexible forefoot for dynamic movements, and durable rubber wrap for rope climbs.

name: Classic Leather
longDescription: Reebok Classic Leather combines premium leather upper with EVA midsole for cushioning. Versatile style that works from street to casual office wear.

name: Future Rider
longDescription: Puma Future Rider combines retro design with modern comfort. Features Rider Foam midsole, textile/rubber upper, and bold color blocking.

name: Basket Pro
longDescription: Campus Basket Pro features high-top design for ankle support, herringbone traction pattern, and responsive cushioning for quick cuts on court.

name: Superstar
longDescription: Adidas Originals Superstar features the iconic rubber shell toe, leather upper, and serrated 3-Stripes. A streetwear essential since 1969.

name: Power Walk
longDescription: Asian Power Walk features air-cushioned midsole, breathable mesh upper, and flexible outsole for all-day walking comfort.

name: React Infinity 3
longDescription: Nike React Infinity Run 3 features soft React foam, widened platform for stability, and Flyknit upper for breathable support during long distances.

name: Zig Dynamica
longDescription: Reebok Zig Dynamica features floating Zig Energy Bands that compress and spring back with every step, providing dynamic energy return.
